data.name: DanceXR Raytracing
data.detailed_description:
The Raytracing version comes with raytracd effects like
* Raytraced reflection
* Raytraced shadow
* Raytraced ambient occulusion
* Raytraced global illumination

All the effects are configurable in graphics settings. It also supports both DLSS and FSR to boost performance.

The Raytracing version is a separate binary than the main app. You can run both versions independently and set them to use the same content library.

An activation is required to unlock the pro features just like the standard version. The license can't be used interchangably between Raytracing and standard versions.

Minimum requirement is graphics cards that support DirectX 12 and DirectX Raytracing. nVidia RTX series is recommended.

Performance warning:
Realtime raytracing is a lot more demanding than the standard version. Expect FPS to drop by half in desktop mode comparing to standard. VR mode is supported but is currently experimental, you will need to turn on DLSS for a reasonable FPS even if you have a higher end card.
data.about_the_game:
The Raytracing version comes with raytracd effects like
* Raytraced reflection
* Raytraced shadow
* Raytraced ambient occulusion
* Raytraced global illumination

All the effects are configurable in graphics settings. It also supports both DLSS and FSR to boost performance.

The Raytracing version is a separate binary than the main app. You can run both versions independently and set them to use the same content library.

An activation is required to unlock the pro features just like the standard version. The license can't be used interchangably between Raytracing and standard versions.

Minimum requirement is graphics cards that support DirectX 12 and DirectX Raytracing. nVidia RTX series is recommended.

Performance warning:
Realtime raytracing is a lot more demanding than the standard version. Expect FPS to drop by half in desktop mode comparing to standard. VR mode is supported but is currently experimental, you will need to turn on DLSS for a reasonable FPS even if you have a higher end card.
data.short_description: Raytracing version comes with realtime raytracing effects that provides the best image quality possible.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX or similar level cards that supports DirectX Raytracing
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX or similar level cards that supports DirectX Raytracing
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
The main purpose of this program is to playback dance motions on 3D character models. The user will need to create or collect these contents and store them in their own content library to be able to use with this program. These 3rd party models and motions may depict nuidity and sexual activites.

Other than the user created content, the program contains certain built-in content that maybe sexual related, including a customizable model and a few procedural (programatically generated) motions.
